Reviews.Title: HP Pavilon
Reviews.Author: EA
Reviews.Content: This computer is everything I expected it to be. I'll be using it for my homebased business and with all the memory built in I should be FINE!

Reviews.Title: Just as I asked.
Reviews.Author: san1510
Reviews.Content: I asked for a computer that was fast, nearly bare-boned. Easily setup. I received it!! There is nothing else to say.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LAPTOP!
Reviews.Author: JoelM
Reviews.Content: I bought this item as an upgrade to my 3 years old HP Pavilion dv7 entertainment laptop (1st generation Intel I-5) which I am giving it to my daughter.  Between the two laptops, I see no difference in speed and access time.  They are very fast.  I like the fact the laptop battery provides an elevated position--very convenient.  The sound is great--off course, it's a beats audio.  What can I say?  HP makes great laptops.  For this item, the price is very reasonable.  I saved $200.00 buying it from Amazon.  I saved sales tax as well.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Bruce "Bruce"
Reviews.Content: It's got pretty good battery life, but you'll have 30 minutes of battery left, and the screen will go blank.  I don't like the "crap ware" installed, and I don't like the stupid pop-ups from HP that keep popping up.  It does work, but for the price I expected more.  I have no idea why it's so slow, I'll have 2% of the CPU being used, half the memory being used, and it won't respond.  I get frustrated and start beating the keyboard.  I have the feeling I'm going to just throw the damn thing one of these days.  If I had it to do over I'd look at different computers, but I needed one right away so I'm stuck with it.added 5-1-2013Ok, let me add that I'm impressed that an HP rep commented.  I watch movies on it and it's a pretty nice picture.  When I wrote the review I was feeling frustration, which could be due to windows or norton or whatever.  Even though I've beaten the keyboard, it still works.  I'm going to keep it at 3 stars, I'm not real happy with it but it does serve me daily.  Let me add, I'm a retired main-frame database administrator.  It's really frustrating being made to feel stupid.

Reviews.Title: Second hp
Reviews.Author: RMP
Reviews.Content: The order arrived as scheduled and the product was in excellent condition.  The sound is great.  i would prefer a silver keyboard instead black.  The silver keyboard reflects the screen light and makes it much easier to see the keys.  i think.

Reviews.Title: Buena Maquina
Reviews.Author: Alberto Jose Carrero obelmejias
Reviews.Content: Excelente maquina! cubre mis necesidades de acuerdo a lo que yo estimaba, a penas estoy empezando a sacarle el hierro

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: chico
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for a reasonable price and test out the performance. It's faster than I thought and the battery life was great, the only problem is the battery is not flat. Since it's still new, I will wait and see how it will live up to its reputation in the future.
